Question: CTA Center CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
CTA Center

CES 2024

- The CTA Foundation announces the CES 2024 Innovation Awards honorees, including 36 products recognized as the year’s ‘Best of Innovation.’ The program received more than 3000 submissions, a record high and a 40% increase over CES 2023.

- The CES 2024 Innovation Awards features a new category – artificial intelligence (AI). The AI category received 7% of all applications, underscoring the transformative potential of AI in shaping the future of technology.

- The CES 2024 Innovation Awards showcase a wide range of products from various categories, including digital health, sustainability, eco-design, smart energy, and artificial intelligence.

- The CES 2024 exhibit will feature interactive exhibits, compelling programming, and visions from first-time exhibitors, including EssilorLuxottica, Fandom, Kroger Precision Marketing, Kubota, Madhive, Midea, Nexstar Media Group, Noom, Paramount, Purdue, Pyxis, Recaro, ResMed, Supernal, and the U.S. Navy.

- The CES 2024 show will highlight innovations in sustainability, transportation and mobility, AI, digital health, and more, addressing the world’s greatest challenges.

- The CES 2024 Innovation Awards honorees include products such as the Garmin Venu® 3, Bosch Gun Detection System, and HP Spectre Fold, among others. These products represent outstanding design and engineering in consumer technology across various categories.

- The CTA Foundation, the owner and producer of CES, explains the show’s importance in the grand scheme of things, showcasing the entire tech landscape at one event and providing a platform for breakthrough technologies and global innovators.

- The CES 2024 Media Days will take place before CES opens to the tech industry, providing registered media access to news-breaking press conferences and CES Unveiled Las Vegas, a first-hand preview of the products launching at CES 2024. The Media Days schedule consists of top exhibitors breaking news and offering exclusive looks at what they plan to showcase at CES 2024, joined by three first-time Media Days exhibitors.

- Media will gain exclusive insight on the latest tech research and trends to watch during CES 2024 at CTA’s anticipated annual presentation – Tech Trends to Watch. Attendees will get early access to Unveiled Las Vegas, the official media event of CES, and have the opportunity to meet with exhibitors and get a sneak peek at the groundbreaking innovations expected at CES 2024.

- Siemens CEO Dr. Roland Busch will deliver the pre-show keynote at CES 2024.

- The CES 2024 exhibit halls will open at 10 AM on Jan. 9, 2024.

- CES® is the most powerful tech event in the world, owned and produced by the Consumer Technology Association (CTA)®, providing the ultimate platform for technology leaders to connect, collaborate, and propel consumer technology forward.
Summary_cn:
CTA中心

CES 2024

- CTA基金会宣布CES 2024创新奖的获奖者，其中36个产品被评为当年的“最佳创新”。该计划收到了超过3000份提交申请，创历史新高，比CES 2023增长了40%。

- CES 2024创新奖新增了一个类别 - 人工智能（AI）。AI类别占所有申请的7%，凸显了人工智能在塑造未来技术方面的变革潜力。

- CES 2024创新奖展示了各类别的各种产品，包括数字健康、可持续性、生态设计、智能能源和人工智能。

- CES 2024展览将展示互动展览、吸引人的节目和来自首次参展商的愿景，包括EssilorLuxottica、Fandom、Kroger Precision Marketing、Kubota、Madhive、Midea、Nexstar Media Group、Noom、Paramount、Purdue、Pyxis、Recaro、ResMed、Supernal和美国海军。

- CES 2024展示将突出可持续性、交通和出行、人工智能、数字健康等方面的创新，应对世界面临的最大挑战。

- CES 2024创新奖获奖者包括Garmin Venu® 3、博世枪械检测系统和HP Spectre Fold等产品。这些产品代表了消费技术领域出色的设计和工程。

- CTA基金会是CES的所有者和制片人，它解释了该展会在宏观范围内的重要性，展示了整个科技领域的一个事件，并为突破性技术和全球创新者提供了一个平台。

- CES 2024的媒体日将在CES向科技行业开放之前举行，为注册媒体提供新闻发布会和CES Unveiled Las Vegas的第一手产品预览。媒体日的日程表包括顶级参展商的新闻发布和他们计划在CES 2024展会上展示的独家内容，同时还有三个首次参展的媒体日展商。

- 媒体将在CTA期待已久的年度报告“技术趋势观察”中获得有关CES 2024的最新技术研究和趋势的独家洞察。与会者将提前进入Unveiled Las Vegas，CES的官方媒体活动，并有机会与参展商会面，提前一瞥CES 2024预计的突破性创新。

- 西门子首席执行官Roland Busch博士将在CES 2024展会前发表主题演讲。

- CES 2024展览大厅将于2024年1月9日上午10点开放。

- CES®是世界上最有影响力的科技活动，由消费技术协会（CTA）®拥有和制作，为技术领军者提供了一个终极平台，促进消费技术的发展。
